casebody.data:
ALBERT J. LOMAX v. J. R. WATKINS COMPANY [No. 2,

January Term, 1939.]

Decided January 18th, 1939.

The cause was argued before Bond, C. J., Offutt, Parke, Sloan, Mitchell, Shehan, Johnson, and Delaplaine, JJ.

Philip H. Dorsey, Jr., with whom was C. Henry Camalier on the brief, for the appellant. *692John H. T. Briscoe, with whom was Wm. Aleck Loker on the brief, for the appellee.

The opinion was delivered per Curiam.
